reasoning: EBS is the most common form of epidermolysis bullosa with estimated incidence of ~0.3 per 100k births. Based on epidemiological studies and rare disease registries.
source: Fine JD et al. (2008). The classification of inherited epidermolysis bullosa (EB): Report of the Third International Consensus Meeting on Diagnosis and Classification of EB. J Am Acad Dermatol. 58(6):931-950
